birth_place.zh-cn: 辽宁省铁岭专区开原县莲花镇
birth_place.en: Lianhua Town, Kaiyuan County, Tieling Prefecture, Liaoning Province

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆著名喜剧演员、影视演员，以喜剧小品和东北二人转著称，创办了本山传媒。
description.en: A famous mainland Chinese comedian and film actor, known for his comedy skits and Northeast China's Errenzhuan, and founder of Benshan Media.

zh-cn: 辽宁民间艺术团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由赵本山创办的文化产业集团，2019年更名为辽宁民间艺术团有限公司。
description.en: A cultural industry group founded by Zhao Benshan, renamed Liaoning Folk Art Troupe Co., Ltd. in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山的前妻。
description.en: The ex-wife of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山的现任妻子，辽宁省戏校教师。
description.en: The current wife of Zhao Benshan, a teacher at the Liaoning Provincial Opera School.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与马丽娟的女儿，网络红人。
description.en: Daughter of Zhao Benshan and Ma Lijuan, an internet celebrity.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与马丽娟的儿子。
description.en: Son of Zhao Benshan and Ma Lijuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国相声演员。
description.en: Chinese xiangsheng comedian.

description.zh-cn: 中国小品、二人转演员，曾与赵本山、范伟长期合作。
description.en: Chinese skit and Errenzhuan actress, who had a long-term collaboration with Zhao Benshan and Fan Wei.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，曾与赵本山长期合作。
description.en: Chinese actress, who had a long-term collaboration with Zhao Benshan.

nodes.id: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院

zh-cn: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院
en: Liaoning University Benshan School of Art

description.zh-cn: 由本山传媒与辽宁大学合作成立的艺术学院，2015年6月更名为“辽宁大学艺术学院”。
description.en: An art school co-founded by Benshan Media and Liaoning University, renamed 'Liaoning University School of Art' in June 2015.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国辽宁省沈阳市的公立大学。
description.en: A public university in Shenyang, Liaoning, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的一家职业足球俱乐部。
description.en: A professional football club in Liaoning province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国男演员、歌手、导演，赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Chinese actor, singer, and director, an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手，赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Chinese actress and singer, an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 中国导演、演员、主持人、歌手，赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Chinese director, actor, host, and singer, an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 一起发生在中国辽宁的非法集资案件，涉及数十万养殖户，涉案金额巨大。赵本山因曾为该产品代言而卷入争议。
description.en: An illegal fundraising case in Liaoning, China, involving hundreds of thousands of farmers and a huge amount of money. Zhao Benshan was involved in the controversy for having endorsed the product.

description.zh-cn: 指原重庆市副市长王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留事件，该事件引发了严重的政治连锁反应。
description.en: Refers to the incident where Wang Lijun, former vice mayor of Chongqing, entered the US consulate in Chengdu, triggering serious political chain reactions.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing, who was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原重庆市副市长、公安局局长，后因叛逃等罪名被判刑。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing, later sentenced for defection and other crimes.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, who was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 自2012年王立军事件后，赵本山因与多名落马高官关系密切而卷入一系列政治传闻，导致其事业和公众形象受到严重影响的时期。
description.en: Since the 2012 Wang Lijun incident, Zhao Benshan became embroiled in a series of political rumors due to his close ties with several fallen high-ranking officials, a period during which his career and public image were severely affected.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山主演的电视剧，原定于2014年播出。
description.en: A TV series starring Zhao Benshan, originally scheduled for broadcast in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管广播电视工作的直属机构。
description.en: A direct subordinate institution of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of radio and television.

description.zh-cn: 2014年10月，由中共中央总书记习近平主持召开的中央文艺工作座谈会，以及随后辽宁省和铁岭市召开的相应座谈会。赵本山接连缺席这三级会议，引发广泛关注。
description.en: In October 2014, the central symposium on literature and art was chaired by General Secretary Xi Jinping, followed by corresponding symposiums in Liaoning Province and Tieling City. Zhao Benshan's consecutive absence from these three levels of meetings drew widespread attention.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁广播电视台的卫星电视频道。
description.en: A satellite TV channel of Liaoning Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 中国前主持人、影视从业者，曾与赵本山合作小品。
description.en: Former Chinese host and media personality, who collaborated with Zhao Benshan on skits.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山的徒孙，二人转演员。
description.en: A grand-apprentice of Zhao Benshan, an Errenzhuan actress.

en: Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business

description.zh-cn: 中国的非营利性私立商学院。
description.en: A private, non-profit business school in China.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，赵本山成立了本山传媒。
description.en: In 2003, Zhao Benshan founded Benshan Media.

description.zh-cn: 葛淑珍是赵本山的前妻，两人于1991年5月离婚。
description.en: Ge Shuzhen is Zhao Benshan's ex-wife; they divorced in May 1991.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与马丽娟于1992年8月8日结婚。
description.en: Zhao Benshan married Ma Lijuan on August 8, 1992.

description.zh-cn: 赵一涵是赵本山的女儿。
description.en: Zhao Yihan is the daughter of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 赵一楠是赵本山的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Yinan is the son of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 1987年，相声演员姜昆推荐赵本山参演央视春晚。
description.en: In 1987, xiangsheng comedian Jiang Kun recommended Zhao Benshan to perform at the CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与高秀敏、范伟是长期合作的搭档，被誉为“铁三角”。
description.en: Zhao Benshan, Gao Xiumin, and Fan Wei were long-term partners, known as the 'Iron Triangle'.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山与宋丹丹在央视春晚舞台上多次合作表演小品。
description.en: Zhao Benshan and Song Dandan collaborated on several skits for the CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

relationships.target: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 2004年，本山传媒与辽宁大学合作成立辽宁大学本山艺术学院。
description.en: In 2004, Benshan Media and Liaoning University co-founded the Liaoning University Benshan School of Art.

relationships.target: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 2004年，辽宁大学与本山传媒合作成立辽宁大学本山艺术学院。
description.en: In 2004, Liaoning University and Benshan Media co-founded the Liaoning University Benshan School of Art.

relationships.target: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 赵本山担任辽宁大学本山艺术学院院长。
description.en: Zhao Benshan served as the Dean of Liaoning University Benshan School of Art.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，赵本山入主辽宁足球队担任董事长，但在当赛季结束后即宣布退出。
description.en: In 2005, Zhao Benshan became the chairman of the Liaoning Football Club, but announced his withdrawal after the season.

description.zh-cn: 小沈阳是赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Xiao Shenyang is an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 黄圣依是赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Eva Huang is an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 董成鹏（大鹏）是赵本山的徒弟。
description.en: Dong Chengpeng (Da Peng) is an apprentice of Zhao Benshan.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山因曾为蚁力神产品代言，在2007年蚁力神事件爆发后受到舆论批评。
description.en: Zhao Benshan was criticized by public opinion after the Yilishen scandal broke out in 2007 because he had endorsed the product.

description.zh-cn: 2012年王立军事件后，赵本山与薄熙来、王立军等官员的合照被曝光，引发外界对其政治关系的猜测，开启了其政治风波。
description.en: After the 2012 Wang Lijun incident, photos of Zhao Benshan with officials like Bo Xilai and Wang Lijun were exposed, sparking speculation about his political connections and initiating his political controversy.

description.zh-cn: 据传与薄熙来关系密切，有巨额利益关系。薄熙来事件后，赵本山在本山传媒影视基地摘除了薄熙来的照片。
description.en: He was rumored to have a close relationship and significant financial ties with Bo Xilai. After the Bo Xilai incident, Zhao Benshan removed Bo's photos from the Benshan Media film base.

description.zh-cn: 据传与王立军关系密切。王立军事件后，赵本山在本山传媒影视基地摘除了王立军的照片。
description.en: He was rumored to have a close relationship with Wang Lijun. After the Wang Lijun incident, Zhao Benshan removed Wang's photos from the Benshan Media film base.

description.zh-cn: 据坊间传言，赵本山是周永康、薄熙来政变的核心人物之一。
description.en: According to rumors, Zhao Benshan was one of the core figures in the alleged coup plot by Zhou Yongkang and Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 2014年9月，广电总局以“题材丑化农民群众”为由，在开播前临时停播了赵本山主演的电视剧《爹妈满院》。
description.en: In September 2014, the NRTA halted the broadcast of the Zhao Benshan-starring TV series 'Die Ma Man Yuan' just before its premiere, citing that its theme 'uglified the peasant masses'.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山接连缺席中央、辽宁省和铁岭市的三级文艺工作座谈会，被舆论视为其陷入政治风波的信号。
description.en: Zhao Benshan's consecutive absence from the central, provincial, and municipal level symposiums on literature and art was seen by the public as a sign of his political trouble.

relationships.target: 辽宁大学本山艺术学院

description.zh-cn: 受赵本山政治风波影响，学院于2015年6月更名为“辽宁大学艺术学院”。
description.en: Influenced by Zhao Benshan's political controversy, the school was renamed 'Liaoning University School of Art' in June 2015.

description.zh-cn: 在赵本山陷入政治风波后，一直与其密切合作的辽宁卫视终止了合作关系。
description.en: After Zhao Benshan became embroiled in political controversy, Liaoning TV, which had long collaborated closely with him, terminated their partnership.

description.zh-cn: 在2014年赵本山陷入政治风波时，崔永元公开出面力挺赵本山。
description.en: In 2014, when Zhao Benshan was caught in a political storm, Cui Yongyuan publicly supported him.

description.zh-cn: 2022年，赵本山的徒孙张玉娇在直播中公开指责赵本山，称其是导致她前夫生意失败的始作俑者，并爆料其绯闻。
description.en: In 2022, Zhao Benshan's grand-apprentice Zhang Yujiao publicly accused him in a livestream, claiming he was the instigator of her ex-husband's business failure and exposing his alleged affairs.

description.zh-cn: 2009年9月，赵本山前往美国就读长江商学院的CEO课程。
description.en: In September 2009, Zhao Benshan went to the United States to attend the CEO program at Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business.
